Description.div: Only applicable for published data of Delete Order event, which can be raised by the deleteOrder API. Action = DELETE will be published to indicate that the order will be deleted.

Attribute.Name: DriverDate
Attribute.Description: Date used to driver order processing. '01' represents ReqShipDate, '02' represents ReqDeliveryDate.

Description.div: The channel through which this order was created. If the value of EntryType on the order matches the value of the common code Entry_Type, the common code's attributes are considered during order validation.

Indicates if this order has chained or related lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

Indicates if the order has any delivery lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

Indicates if the order has any product lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

Indicates if the order has any service lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

Attribute.Name: MaxOrderStatus
Attribute.Description: Maximum order status based on all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MaxOrderStatusDesc
Attribute.Description: Description of maximum order status based on all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MinOrderStatus
Attribute.Description: Minimum order status based on all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MinOrderStatusDesc
Attribute.Description: Description of minimum order status based on all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MultipleStatusesExist
Attribute.Description: If order is in more than one status then this flag will be returned as "Y".

Attribute.Name: ScacAndService
Attribute.Description: Value of SCAC and Service code.

Description.div:
Indicates if data should be retrieved from the history table rather than the regular table.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

Attribute.Name: NumberOfOrderLines
Attribute.Description: Number of Order Lines in the Order.

Description.div: Only applicable for published data of Delete Order event, which can be raised by the deleteOrder API. Action = DELETE will be published to indicate that the order line will be deleted.

Attribute.Name: ApptWarning
Attribute.Description: Displays a warning message if CannotScheduleBeforeDate or CannotScheduleAfterDate fields have a Non-Null value.

Attribute.Name: AwaitingDeliveryRequest
Attribute.Description: A flag to indicate if the order line is awaiting for a Delivery service association.

Description.div:
Indicates if this order has chained or related lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

Attribute.Name: HasDeliveryLines
Attribute.Description: Indicates if the line has associated delivery lines. Valid only for product lines.

Description.div:
Indicates if order line has lines derived from it.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

Attribute.Name: HasServiceLines
Attribute.Description: Indicates if the line has associated service lines. Valid only for product lines.

Attribute.Name: InvoicedQty
Attribute.Description: Invoiced quantity on the order line.

Attribute.Name: InvoicedQuantity
Attribute.Description: Invoiced quantity on the order line.

Attribute.Name: MaxLineStatus
Attribute.Description: Maximum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MaxLineStatusDesc
Attribute.Description: Description of maximum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MinLineStatus
Attribute.Description: Minimum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MinLineStatusDesc
Attribute.Description: Description of minimum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MultipleStatusesExist
Attribute.Description: If order line is in more than one status then this flag will be returned as "Y".

Attribute.Name: OpenQty
Attribute.Description: Total quantity that can be cancelled from the line.

Attribute.Name: ReturnReasonLongDesc
Attribute.Description: Long description of the return reason code.

Attribute.Name: ReturnReasonShortDesc
Attribute.Description: Short description of the return reason code.

Attribute.Name: ScacAndService
Attribute.Description: Value of SCAC and Service code.

Attribute.Name: StatusQuantity
Attribute.Description: Quantity on the order line in the current status.

Description.div:
Indicates if item needs to be validated against catalog. If passed, the configuration rule for validating the item will be overridden.
Default: Null
Valid Values: Y or N

Indicates if data is fetched from the history table rather than the regular table.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

Attribute.Name: CreditWOReceipt
Attribute.Description: Indicates if credit has been issued upon receipt of the returned goods.

Attribute.Name: ReturnWindow
Attribute.Description: Number of days within which the item must be returned for it to be accepted as a return on the system.

Attribute.Name: NumberOfWorkOrders
Attribute.Description: Number of work orders generated for this order line.

Attribute.Name: FillQuantity
Attribute.Description: The minimum order line quantity that must be fulfilled in an order release before it is shipped.

Attribute.Name: InvoicedQuantity
Attribute.Description: Invoiced quantity on the order line.

Attribute.Name: OpenQty
Attribute.Description: Total quantity that can be cancelled from the line.

Attribute.Name: OrderedQty
Attribute.Description: The quantity of the the line item that has been ordered. If part of line is cancelled, this number is reduced appropriately. If an order line is returned, this number is not reduced.

Attribute.Name: OriginalOrderedQty
Attribute.Description: Quantity which was ordered during order creation. This is not modified after order confirmation.

Attribute.Name: ReceivedQty
Attribute.Description: Received quantity on the order line.

Attribute.Name: SettledQuantity
Attribute.Description: Quantity which should be settled before it is actually invoiced.

Attribute.Name: ShippedQuantity
Attribute.Description: Shippped quantity on the order line.

Attribute.Name: SplitQty
Attribute.Description: Quantity which has been split from this line due to substitutions, price negotiations etc.

Attribute.Name: StatusQuantity
Attribute.Description: Quantity on the order line in the current status.

Attribute.Name: TranDiscrepancyQty
Attribute.Description: Quantity which was over or under received.

Attribute.Name: TransactionalUOM
Attribute.Description: UOM on which all the transactional quantities are specified.

Description.div: Describes the Sourcing Controls attached to a OrderLine.
Contains information about order line pricing and quantity details.

Attribute.Name: NumberOfKitLines
Attribute.Description: Total number of kit lines fetched.

Attribute.Name: KitQty
Attribute.Description: The number of components required to one kit.

Attribute.Name: TransactionalUOM
Attribute.Description: UOM on which all the transactional quantities are specified.

Description.div: Contains information about the quantities for a kit line in Transactional Unit Of Measure.

Attribute.Name: TransactionalUOM
Attribute.Description: UOM on which all the transactional quantities are specified.

Description.div: Contains information about the transaction quantity for the schedule.

Attribute.Name: NumberOfAdditionalAddresses
Attribute.Description: Number of additional addresses applicable to this order line.

Description.div: Contains information about the price and total amount details for the order line.

Attribute.Name: LineTotal
Attribute.Description: Line total invoiced for the line.

Attribute.Name: Tax
Attribute.Description: Tax amount invoiced for the line.

Description.div: Contains information about the price and total amount details that are invoiced for the order line.
Contains information about the price and total amount details that are not invoiced for the order line.
Charges.
Discount.
Extended price.
Line total.
Tax.
Unit price.
Contains information about the price and total amount details that are invoiced for the order line represented in Enterprise Currency.
Charges.
Discount.
Extended price.
Line total.
Tax.
Unit price.
Contains information about the price and total amount details that are not invoiced for the order line represented in Enterprise Currency.

Attribute.Name: ReceivingNode
Attribute.Description: Receiving node this order is meant for.

Attribute.Name: TotalQuantity
Attribute.Description: Total quantity which has ever been moved into this status. If there is a cyclic status (for example, backorder which can happen multiple times), this attribute does not provide useful information.

Attribute.Name: TransactionalUOM
Attribute.Description: UOM on which all the transactional quantities are specified.

Attribute.Name: TransactionalUOM
Attribute.Description: UOM on which all the transactional quantities are specified.

Description.div: Contains information about the quantities for kit detail in Transactional Unit Of Measure.
Contains information about the service request details for the order line.
Contains information about the request details for which this delivery or service request is created.
Contains information about the service request details for the order line.
Contains information about the service request details for the order line.
Contains information about the delivery request details for the order line.
Contains information about the parent relationships of the order lines.
Contains information about the parent order line for the relationship.
Contains information about the child order line for the relationship.
Contains information about the parent relationships of the order lines.
Contains information about the parent order line for the relationship.
Contains information about the child order line for the relationship.

Element.Description: Identifies the bundle parent order line for this line.

Attribute.Name: Tranname
Attribute.Description: Specifies the name of the Transaction

Description.div:
Primary key generated by the system. May be passed to identify the OrderLine. Alternatively, the TransactionalLineId or
the PrimeLineNo and the SubLineNo can be passed.
OrderLineKey must identify an existing OrderLine.

The order line number. Must be passed with the SubLineNo to identify the OrderLine. Alternatively, the TransactionalLineId or the OrderLineKey can be passed.
Must pass one of the following:
the PrimeLineNo and the SubLineNo
or TransactionalLineId or the OrderLineKey.

Must be passed with the PrimeLineNo to identify the OrderLine. Alternatively, the TransactionalLineId or the OrderLineKey can be passed.
Must pass one of the following:
the PrimeLineNo and the SubLineNo
or TransactionalLineId or the OrderLineKey.

A virtual field meant to identify order lines when PrimeLineNo and SubLineNo are not passed. Used in Line Associations. This value is not stored in the database. While creating a new line and associating it with another line, the same attribute must be passed in the OrderLine element and in this element to uniquely identify a line if OrderLineKey or PrimeLineNo and SubLineNo are not present.
Must pass one of the following:
the PrimeLineNo and the SubLineNo
or TransactionalLineId or the OrderLineKey.

Element.Description: Identifies the bundle parent order line for this line.

Attribute.Name: Tranname
Attribute.Description: Specifies the name of the Transaction

Description.div: Currency of the Order
Currency of the Order's Enterprise
Date for which the conversion rate between currencies is used
Conversion rate between currencies
Total Amount

Attribute.Name: AdditionalLinePriceTotal
Attribute.Description: Total Price for all Non-Informational and Non-Recurring Additional Line Prices for the Order.

Description.div: The total amount of charges applied on the order and lines.
The total amount of discounts applied on the order and lines.

Attribute.Name: GrandShippingBaseCharge
Attribute.Description: The amount that will be charged for shipping without discounts or charges for the entire order.

Attribute.Name: GrandShippingCharges
Attribute.Description: The total of charges associated with shipping for the entire order.

Attribute.Name: GrandShippingDiscount
Attribute.Description: The total of discounts associated with shipping for the entire order.

Attribute.Name: GrandShippingTotal
Attribute.Description: The total amount for shipping the line including shipping discounts and charges for the entire order.

Description.div: The total amount of taxes applied on the order and lines.
The total amount of charges applied directly to the order header.
The total amount of discounts applied directly to the order header.

Attribute.Name: HdrShippingBaseCharge
Attribute.Description: The amount that will be charged for shipping without discounts or charges for the order header only.

Attribute.Name: HdrShippingCharges
Attribute.Description: The total of charges associated with shipping for the order header only.

Attribute.Name: HdrShippingDiscount
Attribute.Description: The total of discounts associated with shipping for the order header only.

Attribute.Name: HdrShippingTotal
Attribute.Description: The total amount for shipping the line including shipping discounts and charges for the order header only.

Description.div: The total amount of taxes applied directly to the order header.
The total amount of the order excluding line totals.
The line sub total for this order. This is the sum of each line's ExtendedPrice.
The percentage of the total for which manual discounts were applied. Sum of Manual Charges on Order and Lines / (Order Total - Sum of Manual Charges on Order and Lines)

The percentage of the amount being made on the product being sold. ( (Extended Price of all items on the order + charges that are considered for profit margin calculation) - (Sum of Item Cost across all lines))/(Extended Price of all items on the order + charges that are considered for profit margin calculation)
If ExtendedPrice+Charges is zero, PercentProfitMargin is not returned.

Attribute.Name: RecurringAdditionalLinePriceTotal
Attribute.Description: Total Price for all Non-Informational and Recurring Additional Line Prices for the Order.

Description.div: Contains information about the price and total amount details for the order line.
Contains information about the price and total amount details that are not invoiced for the order.

Attribute.Name: AdditionalLinePriceTotal
Attribute.Description: Total Price for all Non-Informational and Non-Recurring Additional Line Prices for the Order.

Description.div: The total amount in the enterprise's currency of charges applied on the order and lines.
The total amount in the enterprise's currency of discounts applied on the order and lines.
The total amount in the enterprise's currency of taxes applied on the order and lines.
The grand total in the enterprise's currency for the order. Includes all line charges and taxes.
The total amount in the enterprise's currency of charges applied directly to the order header.
The total amount in the enterprise's currency of discounts applied directly to the order header.
The total amount in the enterprise's currency of taxes applied directly to the order header.
The total amount in the enterprise's currency of the order excluding line totals.
The line sub total in the enterprise's currency for this order. This is the sum of each line's ExtendedPrice.

Attribute.Name: RecurringAdditionalLinePriceTotal
Attribute.Description: Total Price for all Non-Informational and Recurring Additional Line Prices for the Order.

Attribute.Name: LineSubTotal
Attribute.Description: Line Sub Total in Enterprise currency

Attribute.Name: AwaitingAuthInterfaceAmount
Attribute.Description: Awaiting authorization amount on this payment method.

Attribute.Name: AwaitingChargeInterfaceAmount
Attribute.Description: Awaiting charge amount on this payment method.

Attribute.Name: SuspendAnyMoreCharges
Attribute.Description: Flag to indicate more charging has to be suspended.

Attribute.Name: RemainingToAuthorize
Attribute.Description: Total Amount remaining to be authorized. This is calculated as Book Amount - Settled Amount - Invoiced Amount. This also deducts amounts to be settled in store such as cash and carry lines, or in store payment lines.

Attribute.Name: RemainingToCharge
Attribute.Description: Total Amount remaining to be charged

Attribute.Name: RemainingToRefund
Attribute.Description: Total Amount remaining to be refund

Description.div: Remaining totals

Attribute.Name: AwaitingAuthInterfaceAmount
Attribute.Description: Awaiting authorization amount on this payment method.

Attribute.Name: AwaitingChargeInterfaceAmount
Attribute.Description: Awaiting charge amount on this payment method.

Attribute.Name: SuspendAnyMoreCharges
Attribute.Description: Flag to indicate more charging has to be suspended.

Attribute.Name: TotalQuantity
Attribute.Description: Total quantity has ever been moved into this status. If there is a cyclic status (for example, backorder which can happen multiple times), this column does not provide useful information.

Attribute.Name: TransactionalUOM
Attribute.Description: UOM on which all the transactional quantities are specified.

Attribute.Name: TransactionalUOM
Attribute.Description: UOM on which all the transactional quantities are specified.

Attribute.Name: OrderLineKey
Attribute.Description: Order line key of the associated product line.

Attribute.Name: PrimeLineNo
Attribute.Description: Prime line number of the associated product line.

Attribute.Name: SubLineNo
Attribute.Description: Sub line number of the associated product line.

Attribute.Name: OrderLineKey
Attribute.Description: Order line key of the associated service line.

Attribute.Name: PrimeLineNo
Attribute.Description: Prime line number of the associated service line.

Attribute.Name: SubLineNo
Attribute.Description: Sub line number of the associated service line.

Attribute.Name: OrderLineKey
Attribute.Description: Order line key of the associated product line.

Attribute.Name: PrimeLineNo
Attribute.Description: Prime line number of the associated product line.

Attribute.Name: SubLineNo
Attribute.Description: Sub line number of the associated product line.

Attribute.Name: OrderLineKey
Attribute.Description: Order line key of the associated service line.

Attribute.Name: PrimeLineNo
Attribute.Description: Prime line number of the associated service line.

Attribute.Name: SubLineNo
Attribute.Description: Sub line number of the associated service line.

Description.div:
The code identifying the Special Service to be performed on the Order.
SpecialServicesCode must be defined in the configuration

The buyer's contact address. For new records, the BuyerContactAddressKey is the bill to address key defaulted from the customer contact address. If customer contact is not available, the customer account address is used, otherwise obtaining from the buyer organization default address.

The buyer organization that is associated with this opportunity. This must be a valid organization defined in the system.
BuyerOrganizationCode must be valid in the configuration

The co-owner user is a user who jointly owns this opportunity with the orginal owner user.
Invalid User identifiers passed.

This is the customer contact ID for the opportunity. This field maps to contact ID field of YFS_Customer_Contact.
Invalid Contact Identifier.

The document type that is associated with this opportunity. For example, Opportunity document (0020). OpportunityID, DocumentType, EnterpriseCode are required attributes to uniquely identify an opportunity.
DocumentType must be defined in the configuration
Opportunity record does not exist.

The enterprise code. This field is a part of an opportunity's unique key. The EnterpriseCode, DocumentType and OpportunityID together uniquely identify an opportunity.
Default value: DEFAULT
EnterpriseCode must be valid in the configuration
Opportunity record does not exist.

The identification number of the opportunity, which is required during opportunity creation. If not passed the OpportunityID generates based on a system rule setting or from the user exit implementation. Whenever modification is required, OpportunityID is mandatory. OpportunityID, DocumentType, EnterpriseCode are required attributes to uniquely identify an opportunity.
Mandatory parameter missing.

The user in which this opportunity is assigned to.
Invalid User identifiers passed.

This tables stores an opportunity. An opportunity is a sales opportunity that a sales representative foresees and is used to keep track of multiple quotes that will be presented to a specific buyer. Any of these quotes can be negotiated upon but only one of these quotes can be accepted by the buyer, thereby permanently rejecting all other quotes. The opportunity will be closed once an order is created from the buyer selected quote.
Input document is invalid.
Mandated parameters missing.
Opportunity record already existed.
Event template not found.

Attribute.Name: TotalNumberOfRecords
Attribute.Description: Number of Attachments in the Order.

Attribute.Name: FileAttachmentKey
Attribute.Description: The key of the attached file

Attribute.Name: FileContentType
Attribute.Description: Type of the file content as returned by FileUploadServlet

Attribute.Name: FileDescription
Attribute.Description: Description of the file content as returned by FileUploadServlet

Attribute.Name: FileLocation
Attribute.Description: The location of the file as returned by FileUploadServlet

Attribute.Name: FileName
Attribute.Description: Complete name of the file as returned by FileUploadServlet

Attribute.Name: FileSize
Attribute.Description: Size of the file as returned by FileUploadServlet

Description.div:
Action to take
Valid Value:
Delete - Deletes the file attachment.

Attribute.Name: Reset
Attribute.Description: Determines whether the OrderSearchConditions should be reset.

Validation.Condition:
Must pass one of the following combinations:
the OrderNo, EnterpriseCode and the DocumentType
or EntityAttributeName or the EntityAttributeValue.
